note: 基于 Agent 知识库和趋势分析生成的合成报告 - 数据抓取工具暂时不可用

tweets.author: @sama
tweets.text: AI agents are about to change how we work. The next 12 months will see agents that can actually do complex tasks end-to-end, not just chat.

tweets.author: @karpathy
tweets.text: The 'vibe coding' era is here. People are building entire apps by just describing them to AI. This is the democratization of software development we dreamed of.

tweets.author: @ylecun
tweets.text: LLMs are impressive but they're not the path to human-level AI. We need world models that can reason, plan, and understand physics. The current hype is missing the point.

tweets.author: @DrJimFan
tweets.text: DeepSeek R1 has changed everything. Not just the model, but the economics. Training cost matters. Inference cost matters. China just proved they can compete on efficiency.

tweets.author: @AnthropicAI
tweets.text: Claude 3.7 Sonnet is now available with extended thinking mode. We've trained it to show its reasoning process, not just the answer. Transparency in AI reasoning is crucial.

tweets.author: @levelsio
tweets.text: Just shipped 3 new AI features today. Users don't care about your tech stack. They care that it works. Ship fast, iterate faster.

tweets.author: @bindureddy
tweets.text: AI video generation is the new hotness. But everyone is overlooking voice AI. Real-time voice cloning + emotional range is going to disrupt call centers, podcasts, entertainment.

tweets.author: @hardmaru
tweets.text: Reinforcement learning is making a comeback. It's not just for games anymore. RL + LLMs = agents that can actually learn from feedback and improve over time.
